gameConcept.description: A thrilling 3D platformer centered around a young adventurer's quest to rescue their lost friends from a mysterious, ancient jungle.
gameConcept.artStyle: Cartoonish and colorful with a touch of fantasy

tasks: Create detailed concept art for the main character, enemies, and environments.
Design the game world's layout, hidden areas, and secrets.
Define and document core game mechanics, controls, and difficulty levels.
Establish a detailed checkpoint system.
Create the new Unity project.
Import essential assets and set up the project's folder structure.
Design and model the main character and key NPCs.
Create a detailed character progression system.
Begin building the first playable level.
Implement core mechanics and test their functionality.
Design and implement basic enemy AI behaviors.
Create a variety of enemies with different patrol and attack patterns.
Create smooth character animations for movement, jumping, and interactions.
Set up rigging for the main character and enemies.
Compose an initial game soundtrack.
Implement basic sound effects for footsteps, jumps, and item interactions.
Fine-tune controls, gameplay mechanics, and difficulty levels.
Implement a robust checkpoint system and game saves.
Finalize art assets for all levels.
Implement lighting and environment dressing to enhance the visual appeal.
Design and implement the in-game HUD and menus.
Create an engaging main menu and pause screen.
Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix bugs and glitches.
Address player feedback and comments.
Optimize the game for performance across various platforms.
Ensure smooth frame rates and efficient resource usage.
Build the final version of the game for target platforms (PC, consoles, mobile).
Set up store listings and game pages.
Assemble marketing materials and promotional content.
Launch the game on chosen platforms.
Provide post-launch support through updates and patches.
Engage with the community and gather feedback.
Plan and schedule future updates.
Continuously improve and expand the game based on player feedback.
